Ingredients: Water, Sodium C14-16 Olefin Sulfonate, Cocamidopropyl Betaine, Coco-Glucoside, Isopentyldiol, PEG-150 Distearate, Salicylic Acid, Phenoxyethanol, Sodium Benzoate, Citrus Bergamia (Bergamot) Fruit Oil, Juniperus Communis (Juniper) Wood Oil, Organic Lavandula Angustifolia (Lavender) Oil

chunk:
Directions: Two times a day, everyday.

01
Wet your face with warm water


02
Lather one pump of Everyday Face Wash in your hands and then gently apply to your face and neck


03
Wash for 30 seconds, then rinse

Ingredient concerns: HIGH: Use Restrictions; MODERATE: Allergies & Immunotoxicity; LOW: Cancer, Developmental and Reproductive Toxicity
